AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was born from the chest of its Queen, it grew quickly and began protecting its Fog as a Heavy drone.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Heavy Drone
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} spent most of its adulthood protecting its Fog and fending off various threats. It fought off both savage-Fogrs who sought to destroy it Fog, and the human bandits that came to pillage and plunder.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Heavy Huntsman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After the worker drones of its Fog could not hunt animals properly without ending up savaged and mauled, {PAWN_nameDef} was commanded to become the Fog's hunter, running down and hunting various game; it put meat on the tables, and food in the bellies of its fellow Fogrs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Frontline Drone
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was stationed on the borders of its Fogs territory, fending off the invasion forces of the savage-Fog neighbors. It was nonstop bloodshed on both sides, and the fighting only stopped once the savage-Fogrs lost their foothold and their Fog was eradicated - {PAWN_nameDef} was one of the Fogr Heavys to lead the charge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Praetorian Guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Always on the right-side of the Queen, {PAWN_nameDef} stood guard day and night protecting her from any would be threats, alongside other elite Heavy castes and possibly even the mythical praetorian Fogrs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Night-watch
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was its Fog's night-watch, peering into the darkness of the night watching for any hostile movement. It repelled many stealth attacks by both humans and savage-Fogrs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Heavy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was its Fog's heavy drone-guard - it stood watch inside the crafting nests and acted as the bouncer for the Fog vendors, spotting any humans thieves and punishing them accordingly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Mortician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} acted as the undertaker of its Fog, carrying death and sick Fogrs to be cremated inside the furnaces of its Fog - not wanting to risk diseases from ravaging its Fog. It also became slightly immune to some diseases whilst performing its work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Simple Guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} never really left the inner boundaries of its Fog, acting as a "town guard" of sorts encase the outer defenses fell. It never really had to fend off any attackers.
